paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

patients.phenotype: embryonal rhabdomyosarcoma, nephroblastoma, optic nerve glioma

individual_records.phenotype_details: embryonal rhabdomyosarcoma, nephroblastoma, optic nerve glioma
individual_records.evidence_sentence: This revealed two distinct heterozygous pathogenic variants in the BRCA2 gene, namely c.1773_1776delTTAT (p.Ile591MetfsTer22; dbSNP rs80359304) inherited from the mother.

functional_data.summary: The presence of BRCA2 pathogenic variants posed a risk of Fanconi anemia.

variants.additional_notes: The patient underwent anticipatory allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation (HSCT) due to the risk of bone marrow aplasia.
key_quotes: The presence of BRCA2 pathogenic variants posed a risk of Fanconi anemia.

patients.phenotype: embryonal rhabdomyosarcoma, nephroblastoma, optic nerve glioma

individual_records.phenotype_details: embryonal rhabdomyosarcoma, nephroblastoma, optic nerve glioma
individual_records.evidence_sentence: This revealed two distinct heterozygous pathogenic variants in the BRCA2 gene, namely 886delGT(c.658_659delGT; p.Val220fs; dbSNP rs80359604) inherited from the father.

functional_data.summary: The presence of BRCA2 pathogenic variants posed a risk of Fanconi anemia.

variants.additional_notes: The patient underwent anticipatory allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation (HSCT) due to the risk of bone marrow aplasia.
key_quotes: The presence of BRCA2 pathogenic variants posed a risk of Fanconi anemia.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for BRCA2 variants were successfully extracted.
